meanings.definition: The quality or state of being kinky.
meanings.sent1: Her hair had a unique kinkiness that stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: I love the natural kinkiness of her curls.
meanings.sent3: The kinkiness of the old garden hose made it difficult to unravel.
meanings.sent4: The kinkiness of the road ahead twisted and turned like a rollercoaster.
meanings.sent5: The kinkiness of the mystery novel kept me guessing until the very end.

meanings.sent1: The kinkiness of the fabric added a fun texture to the dress.
meanings.sent2: His playful kinkiness always brought laughter to the group.
meanings.sent3: The kinkiness of the situation made everyone burst into giggles.
meanings.sent4: The kinkiness of the art piece challenged traditional norms.
meanings.sent5: The kinkiness of the dance routine was both entertaining and unexpected.
